title: Exploring Dynamic Asset Pricing within Bachelier Market Model. (arXiv:2307.04059v1 [q-fin.GN])
abstract: This paper delves into the dynamics of asset pricing within Bachelier market model, elucidating the representation of risky asset price dynamics and the definition of riskless assets.
context:
Title: Exploring Dynamic Asset Pricing within Bachelier Market Model. (arXiv:2307.04059v1 [q-fin.GN])
Abstract: This paper delves into the dynamics of asset pricing within Bachelier market model, elucidating the representation of risky asset price dynamics and the definition of riskless assets.
translated_title: 在巴歇利尔市场模型中探索动态资产定价
translated_abstract: 本文深入探讨了巴歇利尔市场模型内的资产定价动态，阐述了风险资产价格动态的表示以及无风险资产的定义。
tldr: 本论文研究了巴歇利尔市场模型内的资产定价动态，重点阐述了风险资产价格动态的表示和无风险资产的定义。
en_tdlr: This paper investigates the dynamics of asset pricing within the Bachelier market model, with a focus on the representation of risky asset price dynamics and the definition of riskless assets.
